alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Colleton; Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:53PM EDT until July 08 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF HAMPTON...COLLETON...ALLENDALE AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lena, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Hampton, Lake Warren State Park, Varnville, Estill, Brunson, Gifford, Luray, Crocketville, Lena, Cummings and Almeda Intersection. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
